input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product title.

Product title:
ReadyPlug USB Cable Compatible with HP 1320 LaserJet Printer (10 Feet, Black)

Product keywords:
ReadyPlug Data Cable Compatible with HP 1320 LaserJet Printer
USB 2.0 High Speed Cable upto 480mbps
Length: 10 Feet (3 Meters) - Color: Black
Reduces strain on device port
Keeps cable out of the way
Protected from EMI/RFI interference
Uses an outer foil shield, inner braid shield and twisted-pair composition to ensure performance
For PC or Mac Computer

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The ReadyPlug USB Cable is compatible with HP 1320 LaserJet Printer. This cable transfers data at a high speed of 480mbps. It is 10 feet long with a black color. This cable reduces strain on the device port and keeps the cable out of the way. It is protected from EMI/RFI interference for a reliable connection. This cable is compatible with PC or Mac computers.
input_text.Response B: This extra long ReadyPlug cable is guaranteed to work with the HP 1320 LaserJet Printer. This black USB 2.0 High Speed Cable (upto 480mbps) is 10 ft, allowing a connection a long way from your PC or Mac. The long length gives plenty of range for your connection, helps to reduce strain on the device port, and keeps the cable out of the way. Providing USB syncing to your HP 1320 LaserJet Printer, simply plug into any USB port and get connected. The cable is protected from EMI/RFI interference with an outer foil shield, inner braid shield and twisted-pair composition to ensure performance.
